articles.title: MASSIVE solar flare blasts out high-speed CME, NASA satellite shows; Solar storm set to strike soon - HT Tech
articles.description: It has finally happened. The notorious sunspot AR3363 has exploded producing a massive solar flare. It has released a large CME component that is moving at a high speed. There is a possibility of an Earth-bound solar storm too.
